span.span: Represents a column header for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是派生自的按钮控件 。A object is a button control that is derived from . 属性跟踪鼠标事件和调整列的大小。 properties keep track of mouse events and the resizing of columns. 视图模式下的列标题是 对象。Column headers in a view mode are objects. 您可以 使用在此类和相关类中找到的各种属性自定义对象。You can customize objects by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性以及这些属性之间优先级的详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). 是 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的单个对象 (例如字符串、图像或面板) 。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## Examples 每个 都可以包含上下文 (右键单击) 菜单。Each can contain a context (right-click) menu. 下面的示例演示如何在 XAML 中创建的上下文菜单 。The following example shows how to create a context menu for a in XAML. [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#HeaderContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#headercontextmenu)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现在按下鼠标左键处于按下状态，同时 通过拖放操作移动。This implementation keeps the left mouse button in a pressed state while a is moved by a drag-and-drop operation. 这也会导致 的属性在 `true` 按下鼠标左键时保持设置为。This also causes the property of the to remain set to `true` when the mouse with its left mouse button pressed moves off the header. 此实现会将事件的 事件参数设置为， `false` 使该 方法可以支持移动列的拖放操作。This implementation keeps the event argument set to `false` for the event so that the method can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
